titleStmt.title: The theater of fine deuices containing an hundred morall emblemes. First penned in French by Guillaume de la Perriere, and translated into English by Thomas Combe.
Théâtre des bons engins. English
titleStmt.author: La Perrière, Guillaume de, 1499-1565.
Combe, Thomas, fl. 1593-1614.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: La theatre des bons engins.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
